Token.Abstract: Implments a general purpose delegate for VirtuosoLicenseManagerDelegate.

Adds VirtuosoLicenseConfiguration for the specified AssetID.
config Instance of VirtuosoLicenseConfiguration object that will be used to initialize the license assetID Identifies the asset to which this License applies.

ReturnValue.Abstract: True if successful. False indicates one of the required parameters was invalid.

Token.Abstract:
Adds VirtuosoLicenseConfiguration for use with any asset that does not have a specific instance of VirtuosoLicenseConfiguration.
config Instance of VirtuosoLicenseConfiguration object that will be used to initialize the license

ReturnValue.Abstract: True if successful. False indicates one of the required parameters was invalid.

Token.Abstract: Verifies internal configuration has been setup.

ReturnValue.Abstract: True if contains valid VirtuosoLicenseConfiguration settings.
